attributes.title: This is a peice of trash

attributes.title: Terrible fake news app

attributes.title: scared for my life
attributes.review: i heard of this app on tiktok so i downloaded it but then my phone got a virus i think because they messaged everyone in my contacts to vote for trump so then i deleted the app but when i woke up i started turning orange and i saw him in front of my house he tried to get me to download the app again but i refused please don’t get this app it is so toxic
